mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Profiles ( username, user_password, email, user_role ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{user_password}, #{email}, #{user_role} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.username, p.user_password, p.email, p.user_role, cc.description as user_role_name FROM Profiles p LEFT JOIN common_codes cc on cc.code = p.user_role WHERE p.username = #{username}
